LanguageData.PlantAgave.label: agave
LanguageData.PlantAgave.description: Una planta del desert de grans fulles i tiges vebibles.
LanguageData.PlantSaguaroCactus.label: saguaro

LanguageData.PlantPincushionCactus.label: Hakea
